name: IP_NURSE_NOTES
description: This table displays information for nurse notes.

columns.name: INPATIENT_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the inpatient record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NURSE_NOTE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of the nurse note.

columns.name: NURSE_NOTE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The status of the nurse note.

columns.name: NURSE_AUTHOR_ID
columns.description: The ID of the nurse who authored the note.

columns.name: NURSE_AUTHOR_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: NURSE_NOTE_INST_TM
columns.description: The time that the nurse note was saved.

columns.name: NURSE_NOTE_TEXT
columns.description: The text of the nurse note.

columns.name: NURSE_NOTE_COPIED
columns.description: Stores the nurse note copied to chart.

columns.name: SR_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The priority of the nurse note.

columns.name: NURSE_NOTE_RICH_TEXT
columns.description: Stores the rich text of a nurse note created from the Sign Out Report or ED Comments activity.
